name: Wink Dazzle Dual-Ended Eyeshadow Stick
about: What it is:A dual-ended creamy eyeshadow stick and glitter stamp that glides onto the eye area to create a stunning matte, shimmer, or glitter look in three easy steps..Highlighted Ingredients:- Jojoba Oil and Argan Oil: Moisturizes skin without irritation..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Swipe on the creamy, blendable shadow stick formula for a quick and natural pop of color to your eyelids and under eye. Use the versatile glitter stamp to create a dazzling eye look or use it to highlight desired of your face.
ingredients: -Jojoba Oil and Argan Oil: Moisturizes skin without irritation..-Vitamin E: Enhances skin vitality....Stick:.Dimethicone, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica (Ci 77019), Phenyl Trimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Synthetic Wax, Stearyl Dimethicone, Ozokerite, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Silica, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbitan Isostearate, Propylene Carbonate, Tin Oxide....Stamp:.Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Dimethicone, Bis-Hydroxyethoxypropyl Dimethicone/Ipdi Copolymer Ethylcarbamate, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Calcium Titanium Borosilicate, Silica, Octyldodecanol, Polypropylsilsesquioxane, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Glyceryl Behenate/Eicosadioate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, Mica (Ci 77019), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Caprylyl Glycol, Tin Oxide, Triethoxycaprylylsilane.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Swipe, blend, and stamp: .-Swipe: Swipe shadow stick across eyelid.-Blend: Blend with fingertip..-Stamp: Twist open the cap and stamp on desired areas to add glitter

The sparkly end is a joke, there is zero sparkle, they might have put 0.01G of product on it. All in all I will not use this because it's way too subtle, to a point of invisible, and I have no idea how they are charging 22 dollars for this. Scam :(

Ideal for anyone looking to spice up their look, this Multi Stick is a true standout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: The stick makes application a breeze u2013 no mess. It's become my quick fix for adding a bit of dazzle to my look. While not the cheapest, the convenience and the charming sparkle make it a regular in my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

Perfect for quick touch-ups on the go, this eyeshadow stick is a great addition to any makeup bag.

reviews.review_title: Must-Have for on the go makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have the color Mocha Sparkle and i really like it. The eyeshadow part is matte. Its a very warm toned brown. I love that the eyeshadow is matte but the other end is full sparkle! I use the sparkle side a lot with a lot of different eyeshadows. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this Kaja Wink Dazzle eyeshadow  & glitter multi stick I had the pleasure to try the shade champagne sequin this is such a beautiful color and I love how creamy the texture is it applies flawlessly on my eyelids and stays in place all day. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, I enjoyed using this eyeshadow stick, especially if you're not aiming for precision and prefer a subtle no-makeup makeup look. A heads-up for those with hooded lids, like myself: depending on where you apply the eyeshadow portion, it might feel a bit sticky. I recommend avoiding areas where your lid folds if you want to steer clear of that tacky sensation on your lids.  I received this product as a gift from Kaja Beauty, but all opinions expressed are my own!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Wonderful color and easy to apply.

reviews.review_title: Must have in your makeup bag!

I feel like this product is very versatile and both the eyeshadow and glitter stamp can be used alongside other eyeshadows or eye products to create a variety of looks. reviews.review_text: I have loved Kaja since my first Beauty Bento so I was very excited to test this Wink Dazzle Eyeshadow & Glitter Multi stick in Ice Illusion.  This double sided multi stick is one half creamy pencil and the other a glitter with foam applicator. I was a little disappointed with this being more of a liner than an eyeshadow. Because it is liner sized, it only applied a small amount of product and took multiple swipes to get the coverage I desired. This blends well by using just my finger, but it needed extra work when used in combination with other eyeshadow. The glitter side did have some flakiness when first pulled from the tube and when applying, needed to be dabbed and dipped back into the container to get enough product on the lid. This is a drier texture than expected, which made this be a bit more work than I am used to with this type of product, but it did not leave fall out, wish I appreciate. I did multiple looks over a few days and recommend a primer to get this to last throughout the day without separating. Ice Illusion is a champagne color on my fair skin with the glitter leaning a big more towards white. If I could change two things, I wish the glitter was a bit more impactful and the eyeshadow was a bit larger in size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In the fast-paced world of makeup, the Wink Dazzle Eyeshadow & Glitter Multi Stick stands out as a multifaceted gem. Designed for the modern individual who values both efficiency and elegance, this product is a unique combination of eyeshadow and glitter in a single, convenient stick.  The stick's design eliminates the need for multiple brushes, making it perfect for quick applications or makeup on the move. The gel-based formula of the eyeshadow glides on with ease, offering a user-friendly experience. However, those seeking a deeper hue may find the need for several applications a slight drawback.  The eyeshadow presents a delightful light brown shade, akin to a soothing mocha coffee. This neutral yet elegant color is versatile and can be adapted to various styles and occasions. The creamy consistency of the eyeshadow is noteworthy u2013 it blends seamlessly on the eyelid and remarkably, maintains its vibrancy without the necessity of an eye primer.  On the other end of the stick, the glitter feature adds a playful yet sophisticated touch to the makeup routine. While its application is straightforward, achieving a concentrated glitter effect requires multiple applications. This might be slightly inconvenient for users looking for a quick, intense glitter application.  The product excels in creating an effortlessly chic look. The eyeshadow allows for a beautifully blended, smoky eye look with rich brown undertones, suitable for a variety of looks from daywear to evening glam. The glitter, when applied generously, can transform the look into something more dazzling, perfect for more festive or special occasions.  The Wink Dazzle Eyeshadow & Glitter Multi Stick is a commendable innovation in the beauty industry. It prioritizes convenience without sacrificing the quality and versatility of the makeup. While it may require a bit of patience for those desiring more intense color and glitter, its ease of blending, and the elegant final look it produces.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Wink Dazzle Eyeshadow & Glitter Multi Stick, and it exceeded my expectations. The convenience of a multi-use stick is a game-changer for my beauty routine. The eyeshadow applies effortlessly, providing a vibrant and long-lasting color that stays put throughout the day.   What sets this product apart is its dual function u2013 not only does it work as an eyeshadow, but the added glitter feature takes it to the next level. The glitter is finely milled, giving a subtle yet dazzling sparkle that enhances the overall look without being too overwhelming. It's perfect for both day and night looks, allowing for versatility in styling.  The formula is creamy and blendable, making it easy to achieve a seamless application. I appreciate the buildable nature of the product; whether I want a sheer wash of color or a bolder statement, the Wink Dazzle Multi Stick delivers.  Another noteworthy aspect is its portability. The sleek design makes it ideal for on-the-go touch-ups, and I love that I can achieve a complete eye look with just one product. Plus, the stick format minimizes any mess or fuss typically associated with loose glitter.  Overall, the Wink Dazzle Eyeshadow & Glitter Multi Stick has become a staple in my makeup collection. Its convenience, pigmentation, and versatility make it a must-have for anyone looking to elevate their eye makeup game.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm grateful for the opportunity to try this Kaja Wink Dazzle Eyeshadow & Glitter Multi-Stick. I absolutely love it. I wanted to find a product that creates a glittery or almost frosty-looking eye look, and this is buildable, so I can layer the glitter to make a super glittery and wintery snow frost look. The stick is a lovely light champagne color and it blends out really well with your fingers. Using just the stick side creates a pretty look, but then you can also add just a little glitter to create a light glitter look, or layer it for an ice queen look. I chose the ultra-glittery look, so I dipped the applicator into the glitter probably ten times. It's hard to know how much product is in the packaging, so I hope there's enough glitter to last, even with my heavy applications. The directions say to stamp on the glitter and that works well, but it was easiest to just roll it across my eyelids. I'll definitely repurchase this when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Wink Dazzle Eyeshadow and Glitter Stick in Mocha Sparkle by Kaja is a game-changer for anyone seeking effortless glam. This dual-ended stick combines the convenience of a creamy eyeshadow with the sparkle of glitter, making it a versatile addition to my makeup routine. The mocha shade is rich and complements various skin tones, adding depth to my eyes with a touch of warmth. The creamy eyeshadow effortlessly glides on, providing buildable coverage that can go from a subtle daytime look to a more intense evening vibe. What sets this product apart is the glitter end u2013 a fine shimmer that elevates the glam factor without being overbearing. The formulation is smooth, ensuring easy application without any clumping or fallout. I appreciate the long-lasting formula that stays put throughout the day without losing its luster. The compact size makes it perfect for on-the-go touch-ups, and the packaging is both chic and practical. Whether you're a makeup novice or a seasoned pro, the Wink Dazzle stick is a delightful addition to your beauty arsenal, promising a hassle-free way to achieve that coveted sparkly eye look.
